an10.99:35.1:
The extension of the normal description of this state with the phrase “this is peaceful, this is sublime” is found only here and at [dn1:3.16.4
]().
an10.99:38.3: BB uncritically quotes the comm in his note. Unbelievably, the commentary completely ignores the entire point of the sutta. Sometimes you wonder if they’re actually reading the same text.
